page.title: 04INDUSTRY IN MALVERN WELLS
page.content: {Quarrying of granite}for building and road metal has ceased although the scars remain. Despite doubts about industry in rural areas planning permission has recently been given to convert brick huts from the wartime {Merebrook Camp}for use as starter units in light industry. The aim is to encourage new ventures at a time of high unemployment. One firm attracted by the cheap land and good roads and services is Insight which makes specialised{closed circuit TV {equipment}with handmade components. Successful firms may well move to the {Spring Lane Industrial Estate}at Malvern Link. In Malvern Wells {Connoisseur Porcelain}employs 24, making limited editions mostly of English fauna and flora in fine bone china. Some pieces cost l0,000 pounds and 70% of production goes to the USA.
